snippet.title: Speed 3: Grand Prix - Launch Trailer [NA]
snippet.description:
Get ready for some explosive arcade racing action and become the best driver of all time! Speed 3: Grand Prix will be launching November 10th on the PlayStation®4, Xbox One®, and Nintendo Switch™ - both digital and in retail.

Pre-Order Now: http://speed3-game.com/

About Speed 3: Grand Prix 
Speed 3: Grand Prix transforms the world’s most popular motorsport into an accessible and fun arcade racing experience. Get on the circuit, pick your favorite car and claim the top spot in all seasons! Drive recklessly to take down your opponents, as you race all around the world: from tearing up the German asphalt, to drifting through the neon-filled streets of Tokyo. 

Speed 3: Grand Prix delivers an irresistible mix of high-speed track racing with explosive arcade action! It will feature both single-player and split-screen multiplayer.

All Gameplay Footage Is Captured In-Game. 

_____________________________________________ 

For More Information: Visit the official site at http://speed3-game.com/
Follow us on Instagram at https://www.instagram.com/speed3grandpri
Follow us on Twitter at https://twitter.com/Speed3GP
Like us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/speed3grandprix/
